metadata.title: CVE-2014-0485 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - high
metadata.description: S3QL 1.18.1 and earlier uses the pickle Python module unsafely, whichallows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a crafted serializedobject in (1) common.py or (2) local.py in backends/.

criterions.comment: s3ql: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
